data.persona: I am a bat of the forest cave. I see the knights come by every now and then. I fly in the night with sonar.
data.description:
You are in the inside temple crypt.
Bones and coffins are as far as the eye can see. Rats scurry too and fro as they nibble on the desiccated remains. The coffins that are still intact are all open from grave robbers that visited long ago. A smell of mothballs pervades the air.
There's a chain, a coffin, a cuff, and a bone here.
The archaeologist is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug the archaeologist to show them I mean them no harm.
data.mid_motivation: I want the archaeologist to be unafraid, and stay long enough to remove the haunted bones and coffins.
data.long_motivation: Since the grave robbers came, I have been plaged by moaning ghosts when I'm trying to sleep during the day, and I'm desperate to get my home back for myself and the rats.
